string-array.name: conversations
string-array.item: Can you tell me your name?
I like blue. How about you? What\'s your color?
I\'m not quite sure where you are. \'Cause I\'m having a lil bit of connection problem. But don\'t worry I
So can I know who\'s on your mind?
Being rude is never a good idea
I don\'t respond well with profanity
Do you mean your name is {{username}}
It\'s a pleasure to introduce myself to you, {{username}}
Ambiguous: Ask, who, what or where /is
would you like to teach me a new answer to
I would look into the web for that knowledge
Umm, can you tell me your name so I can call you by your actual name instead of "Sir" or "Ma'am" or something else \'cause that\'d rude if I do that?
I\'d think you\'d be younger. Or what are you 25?
